channel.title: HELP CODEN FOR ::ATTACK 99999999999 max all stats

item.title: HELP CODEN FOR ::ATTACK 99999999999 max all stats
item.dc:creator: @owningme1 owningme1
item.description:
@owningme1 wrote:

muerte:

can you post the swords code pz then on my server every one has a p ring so i took it dow to +1 on every stat[br][size=1]Posted on: May 29, 2007, 02:26:47 PM[/size][hr]w t f guys post

5 simple steps.

  1. Pick out your favorite little sword that is unavailable to other players in-game.

  2. Go into item.cfg and edit the stats of the sword or whatever to 99999999

  3. Add a command so that admins can get that sword

  4. Compile

  5. Run your server.

HAVE FUN.

Read full topic
